did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services, 1994-2013
did.abstract: The Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services comprise award submission scrapbooks for events and dinners hosted by the Dining Services department of the Division of Student Affairs that were compiled and submitted for awards from 1994 through 2013. A 2009 schematic design for the food court Turner Place at Lavery Hall is also included.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Division of Student Affairs. Dining Services

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Reproduction and Use
userestrict.p: The copyright status of this collection is unknown. Copyright restrictions may apply. Contact Special Collections and University Archives for assistance in determining the use of these materials. Reproduction or digitization of materials for personal or research use can be requested using our reproduction/digitization form: http://bit.ly/scuareproduction. Reproduction or digitization of materials for publication or exhibit use can be requested using our publication/exhibition form: http://bit.ly/scuapublication. Please contact Special Collections and University Archives (specref@vt.edu or 540-231-6308) if you need assistance with forms or to submit a completed form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services, RG 8/2/1j, Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services were transferred to Special Collections and University Archives in 2014.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services was completed in May 2015.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Dining Services department of Virginia Tech is a part of the Division of Student Affairs (DSA). It was previously known as the Culinary Services department and the Dining Programs department as well as being combined with what is now the Housing and Residence Life department, also within the DSA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services primarily comprise award submission scrapbooks for events and dinners hosted by the Dining Services department of the Division of Student Affairs that were compiled and submitted for awards from 1994 through 2013. Awards include the the National Association of College and University Food Services's Loyal E. Horton Dining Awards, Most Innovative Nutrition Program Contest, and Vegetarian Marketplace Competition as well as Cuisine Creators' Vegan Recipe Contest and Most Creative Nutrition Month Promotion. A 2009 schematic design for the food court Turner Place at Lavery Hall is also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Material
relatedmaterial.p: Materials related to Virginia Tech Dining Services, including information about dining halls, are in the Record Group Vertical Files.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The following items were transferred to the Rare Book Collection:

odd.head: Rights Statement for Archival Description
odd.p: The guide to the Records of Virginia Tech Dining Services by Special Collections and University Archives, Virginia Tech, is licensed under a CC0 (https://creativecommons.org/share-your- work/public-domain/cc0/).
